name: Moana fruit punch
description: Time for something fruity. Mixed this up on a whim and very pleased with the results. Enjoy everyone.
author: Aquaneo

reviews.text: Thanks for sharing this recipe.  I have chased the fruit punch recipe a few times, but always get side tracked.  I wasn't able to add TPA Champagne, but was a decent vape as S&V.  Taste good as S&V, will see what a few days does for it.  The fruit punch is not as up front as I am looking for, and sour may be a little high for me.  This definitely helps me, seeing the Citrus Punch . Sour added.  After the steep, I will try to update my review.
